data.name: Kree Noble
data.description: The elite classes of Kree society order others to vanquish their enemies.

starItems.name: Kree Noble
starItems.description: The elite classes of Kree society order others to vanquish their enemies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to remove a positive effect and generate Ability Energy

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to remove a positive effect and generate Ability Energy

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Generate Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random allies

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Always remove a positive effect and generate Ability Energy

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage. Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from the target and generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> allies.

1.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

2.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>205%</color> damage.

3.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

4.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>335%</color> damage.

5.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.

6.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>465%</color> damage.

7.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to an adjacent ally. If that ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>530%</color> damage.

1.description: On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally with a negative effect. If the ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, remove an additional negative effect.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to clear a negative effect

2.description: On Turn, <color=#86e619>60%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally with a negative effect. If the ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, remove an additional negative effect.
2.nextUpgrade: On Turn, +<color=#86e619>15%</color> chance to clear a negative effect

3.description: On Turn, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally with a negative effect. If the ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, remove an additional negative effect.

4.description: On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally with a negative effect. If the ally is <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, remove an additional negative effect.
4.nextUpgrade: On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>2</color> allies with negative effects

5.description: On Turn, clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from <color=#86e619>2</color> allies with negative effects. If those allies are <color=#fff568>KREE</color>, remove an additional negative effect.
